entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pinawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
